name: bidias-ecom-platform
description: Bidias E-Com - Next-Generation E-Commerce Platform with AI Features
author: Joseph Bidias <bidias_consulting@outlook.com>

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.deploy:render: echo 'Deploy using Render dashboard or CLI'
scripts.deploy:netlify: cd frontend && npm run build && netlify deploy --prod --dir=dist
scripts.type-check: cd frontend && npm run type-check && cd ../backend && npm run type-check
scripts.lint: cd frontend && npm run lint && cd ../backend && npm run lint
scripts.format: cd frontend && npm run format && cd ../backend && npm run format
scripts.clean: cd frontend && rm -rf dist node_modules && cd ../backend && rm -rf dist node_modules && rm -rf node_modules
